title: Forwarded emails colors are inconsistent with new emails and resist configuration
content: When in dark mode, forwarded emails: • Are not in dark mode notwithstanding that new emails are. • Bear no resemblance to the email being forwarded whatsoever, with boxes all over and colors completely different not only from those in the email being forwarded, but also from those specified for emails being sent. • Resist configuration of body text, so that not only is the background white instead of black, text remains white or a very pale yellow but illegible in any event.
creator: eb40

title: Forwarded emails contain no signature
content:
Forwarded emails contain no signature, either above or below the forwarded email body.

No means exists in settings to specify that a signature should be in forwarded emails.

Thunderbird resists configuration for included signatures specified in the configuration editor.
creator: eb40

title: Email view
content: Just installed Thunderbird on a new laptop running Windows 11. Accounts are set up and I can see all the emails in my inbox. They are in the Table View. My problem is that I can not view the contents of the email. I used to be able to click/highlight a message and its contents would be displayed below the list of emails. I am unable get this view. Can you please help. Thank you, Jim

title: My local folders have disappeared!
content:
I recently upgraded my older PC from Windows 7 to Windows 10. Thunderbird worked fine for a few days following the upgrade, but when I went into it today, all the local folders were gone. 4GB worth of e-mails. Good thing I backed up four days ago, so I haven't lost much.

I have searched through the help given earlier for a similar problem, but can't seem to still get Thunderbird to work properly. Furthermore, Thunderbird won't import the backed-up data. I also can't get the menu bar to show along the top. What all am I doing wrong?
creator: adtypeanddesign

title: Thunderbird Enhancements
content:
Would like to see these enhancements made to Thunderbird:

  1. Add recipient email address to view. This could be added next to the sender email address, separated by something like a pipe character "|" and identified by "From: ", "F: ", "Sender: ", or "S: " in front of the sender address and "To: ", "T: ", "Recipient: ", or "R: " in front of the recipient address
  2. Add search filter terms to search capability. Some example filter terms would be 1) "mailed-to:" or "recipient" to search for emails sent to a specific email address or domain (using wildcard), 2) "mailed-from" or "sender" to search for emails sent from a specific email address or domain (using wildcard).

title: Thunderbird app on Android locked into authentication loop
content:
duplicate of /questions/1553385 thread in Thunderbird for Android section

Thunderbird app on Android suddenly stopped moving emails; instead just repopulated inbox. Uninstalled and reinstalled app; added email account and proper password. TB locked into "Checking incoming server settings" loop. Comcast properly set up; accessible from browser. Tried entering settings manually; same result. Cleared cache and data; same result.
creator: megamile

title: accessing Outlook calendar on Thunderbird
content:
Recently moved to Linux Mint with Thunderbird 140.5. It's a new experience. Thunderbird has downloaded all my emails and folders from my Outlook.com account. Can send, receive, edit emails no problems and all is visible from Outlook client on other machines. Thunderbird does not show my calendar entries or contacts. I do not wish to import from Outlook as I would like to access my Outlook.com from several locations. Been through online Help articles. Nothing seems to work. Have installed TbSync and Lightning Calendar Tabs add-ons with default settings. I have tried suggestions provided in this Mozilla Support. Other forum suggestions don't seem to relate to the version I have.

I'm sure it is something simple as everything else I have done with my new environment is working wonderfully. Thanks in advance.

Bill
creator: bill.ditwell

title: Thunderbird Archive Folders
content:
Is there a reason that settings, such as columns, layout, ordering, folder colours, etc. are not retained in the msf itself?

I have to use multiple machines, so tend to have an archive that I share across them as the primary storage of emails. However, nothing is retained between machines which is a bit annoying when trying to colour code for easy visual cues. So it seems clear that this information is currently stored in the local profile, even though the archive data is a filesystem.

Nonostante abbia già controllato su Aruba che sia tutto registrato, validato e pagato correttamente, ogni volta che apro outlook prima ancora di scegliere l'indirizzo mail da visionare, compare questa segnalazione : " inserire la password per daniela.gentilin@pec.it su imap.pec.it " Sotto compare la striscia dove inserire ma mi dice che la password è errata. title: Cannot delete folder from Thunderbird after folder has been deleted on the mail server
content:
Hello, I recently cleaned up my mail account and deleted obsolete folders on one device. The folder has been deleted on the server, but Thunderbird on another computer still shows the folder. In the subscribe menu the folder is not shown. But when I try to delete it it throws an error "The current command did not succeed. The mail server for account <account name> responded: [NONEXISTENT] unknown source folder.". The error makes sense since the folder has been deleted on the server. Is there a way to tell Thunderbird to just remove this folder?

Thanks in advance!
creator: artfulspeck

title: Teams connection not working for 1 client out of 5 - unsupported browser
content: Hi, I have thunderbird connected to a number of client corporate Office 365 systems (5 in total). The teams option works fine for 4 of them and is quite usable for chat but one of them responds that the browser is an unsupported version. I use Ubuntu 24.04 and have thunderbird and firefox installed from deb files (and the repos) so both are the current/release versions and overall everything works well so I don't believe there is a systemic issue. All connections to the clients' exchange systems are through the owl plugin. With the one client, as soon as you try to connect to their teams site, the 'Hmmm, your browser isn't supported' page comes up. As I manage that client's office platform, I know I've not made any changes to the back-end settings nor have I done so or had to do so on any of my other clients platforms so I don't think there is anything unusual about the Office 365 side (but am willing to be proved wrong). If I try logging in to the problematic teams site using firefox it works perfectly so I don't believe it is firefox being an issue. I have deleted and re-added the account. Has anyone else seen this and got it sorted, and if so how please? Many thanks, Scott...
creator: scott@introvision

title: Where to Buy ZPHC in USA – Complete Guide for Quality Gear Lovers
content:
If you are searching for a reliable way to Buy ZPHC in USA, you are not alone. ZPHC has become increasingly popular due to its premium build quality, durability, and modern design. Whether you are looking for tactical gear, fitness accessories, or everyday performance equipment, ZPHC products are known for their reliability and competitive pricing. In this guide, we will explore what ZPHC is, why it is in demand, and how you can purchase original products safely in the United States.

What Is ZPHC and Why Is It Popular?

ZPHC is a fast-growing brand recognized for manufacturing high-quality gear designed for performance and durability. The brand focuses on strong materials, ergonomic design, and long-lasting use. Many users prefer ZPHC because it provides premium-level features at a more affordable cost compared to traditional high-end brands.

From professional users to casual buyers, ZPHC appeals to a wide range of customers who value reliability and comfort without overpaying.

Types of ZPHC Products Available in the USA

When planning to buy ZPHC products in the US, it helps to know what categories are commonly available:

Tactical and Outdoor Gear

ZPHC is frequently associated with tactical accessories such as bags, vests, belts, and protective equipment. These items are built to withstand rough outdoor conditions and are suitable for training, hiking, or professional use.

Fitness and Performance Equipment

Many buyers choose ZPHC for gym-related gear like gloves, straps, resistance tools, and protective wear. These products are designed to enhance performance while reducing injury risk.

Everyday Utility Gear

ZPHC also offers versatile products for daily use, combining comfort with durability. This makes the brand suitable for people who want gear that works both indoors and outdoors.

How to Buy Original ZPHC in USA Safely

Because of its growing popularity, counterfeit or low-quality copies can sometimes appear online. Follow these steps to ensure authenticity:

Purchase only from trusted online marketplaces or authorized sellers

Check product descriptions, material details, and customer reviews

Avoid deals that look unrealistically cheap

Confirm return and warranty policies before placing an order

Buying from reputable US-based platforms helps you receive genuine products with customer support.

Online vs Local Stores – Which Is Better?

Online Shopping Benefits

Buying ZPHC online in the USA offers convenience, wider variety, and competitive pricing. You can compare models, read reviews, and get doorstep delivery without hassle.

Local Store Benefits

Local physical stores allow hands-on inspection before purchase. You can check material quality, fitting, and comfort instantly. However, the variety may be limited compared to online options.

The best option depends on whether you value convenience or in-person assessment more.

Why Customers Prefer ZPHC Gear

Here are some reasons why ZPHC keeps gaining popularity in the USA:

Durable materials with long lifespan

Modern and functional design

Reasonable pricing for the quality provided

Suitable for beginners and professionals alike

Positive feedback from repeat buyers

This balance of performance and affordability makes ZPHC a smart investment.

Tips to Get the Best Deal on ZPHC Products

To save money while buying ZPHC in the USA:

Look for seasonal sales or discount codes

Subscribe to seller newsletters for promotional offers

Compare prices across multiple platforms

Check bundle deals to get more value

Smart shopping helps you get premium gear without overspending.

Final Thoughts

If you value durability, performance, and budget-friendly pricing, ZPHC is a strong option. With proper research and trusted sellers, you can confidently invest in authentic products that match your needs. Whether you are buying tactical equipment, fitness accessories, or utility items, choosing the right gear shop ensures long-term satisfaction and value for money.
